```{r}
library(plotly)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(forcats)
```


```{r}
setwd("/Users/hannahpu/OneDrive - University of Illinois - Urbana/R/data")

#Use ggplotly
##Dataset 1
wine = read.csv("wine.csv", header = FALSE)
wine.name = c("Type", "Alcohol", "Malic", "Ash", "Alcalinity", "Magnesium", "Phenols", "Flavanoids", "Nonflavanoids", "Proanthocyanins", "Color", "Hue", "Dilution", "Proline")
colnames(wine) = wine.name
wine$Type = as.factor(wine$Type)
glimpse(wine)

```

```{r}
static = wine %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Flavanoids, y = Proline, color = Type)) +
  geom_point()
static
ggplotly(static)
```
